function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 through air and environmental compartments such as water, soils, and waste water","Impact":"Continued spread of the virus and difficulty in containment","Mitigation":"Enhanced sanitation measures, public health education, and wastewater testing","Technologies":"Air purifiers, sanitation systems, wastewater treatment plants","People":"General public, healthcare workers, sanitation workers","Owner":"Health organizations, government authorities, environmental agencies"}]}
